scripts.build:chrome: node -e "import('./build-scripts/logger.mjs').then(m => m.logStep('Building Chrome extension'))" && cross-env BUILD_MODE=build BROWSER=chrome webpack --config webpack.chrome.js --mode production
scripts.build:firefox: node -e "import('./build-scripts/logger.mjs').then(m => m.logStep('Building Firefox extension'))" && cross-env BUILD_MODE=build BROWSER=firefox webpack --config webpack.firefox.js --mode production
scripts.build: node -e "import('./build-scripts/logger.mjs').then(m => m.logStep('Running Build for All Browsers'))" && pnpm run build:chrome && pnpm run build:firefox
scripts.watch:chrome: node -e "import('./build-scripts/logger.mjs').then(m => m.logStep('Watching Chrome...'))" && cross-env BUILD_MODE=watch BROWSER=chrome webpack --config webpack.chrome.js --watch --mode development
scripts.watch:firefox: node -e "import('./build-scripts/logger.mjs').then(m => m.logStep('Watching Firefox...'))" && cross-env BUILD_MODE=watch BROWSER=firefox webpack --config webpack.firefox.js --watch --mode development
scripts.lint:source: pnpm run lint:source:chrome && pnpm run lint:source:firefox
scripts.validate:firefox: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); execSync('addons-linter ./Build-Extension/Firefox/Translate-It-v' + pkg.version + '/', { stdio: 'inherit' });"
scripts.validate: pnpm run validate:firefox && pnpm run validate:chrome
scripts.pre-submit: pnpm run lint && pnpm run build && pnpm run validate
scripts.publish: node -e "import('./build-scripts/logger.mjs').then(m => m.logStep('Publishing All Artifacts'))" && cross-env PUBLISH_MODE=true pnpm run source && pnpm run lint && cross-env PUBLISH_MODE=true pnpm run build && pnpm run validate
